title: Top-Rated Southern California Five-Star Beachfront Oasis with 1,800sqm Day Spa
description: Ascend to a world of seaside luxury at Montage Laguna Beach, a five-star clifftop haven on the bronzed Southern Californian coast. This beachfront sanctuary stretches across 12 hectares of rugged Californian terrain, with a boardwalk zig-zagging down to the secluded beach. World-class facilities include two crystalline swimming pools - including an adults-only spa pool overlooking the Pacific Ocean - and the 1,800sqm Spa Montage, where treatments are inspired by the rejuvenating properties of the ocean. All four restaurants feature gourmet dining and chef-driven menus; for a true Californian experience, spend an evening at sophisticated The Loft restaurant, where indulgent bites are accompanied by stunning ocean panoramas.
offer_address: 30801 South Coast Highway, Laguna Beach, California 92651, United States
